name: The Dog
storyline: Some middle-aged man has a normal life, house, family and as everyone - some secrets. But not all secrets can be hidden forever. This is a short, atmospheric psychological horror where you play as a middle-aged man dealing with probably the most life-changing day in his life. You can briefly do routine family man tasks and live through the story.
summary: This is a short, atmospheric psychological horror where you play as a middle-aged man dealing with probably the most life-changing day in his life. You can briefly do routine family man tasks and live through the story.
